title: Linguine with pan-fried salmon
ingredients: ['400 g (14 oz) salmon fillet, skinned', 'grated zest and juice of 1 lemon', '2 tbsp chopped fresh dill', '340 g (12 oz) linguine', '225 g (8 oz) carrots, cut into matchstick strips', '225 g (8 oz) courgettes, cut into matchstick strips', '1 tsp sunflower oil', '100 g (3½ oz) reduced-fat crème fraîche', 'salt and pepper', 'To garnish', 'sprigs of fresh dill (optional)', '1 lemon, cut into wedges']
